譝字的基本解释

譝
shéng
赞誉。

譝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shéng］
［《廣韻》食陵切，平蒸，船。］
(1)称誉。
(2)通“繩”。参见“譝譝”。

譝字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　譝； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1182第13
【廣韻】食陵切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】神陵切，?音繩。【廣韻】譽也，又稱舉也。　又言朴也。【子華子·問仕篇】譝譝兮如將孩。　又人名。希譝，見【宋史·宗室表】。　又【集韻】通作繩。【左傳·莊十四年】蔡哀侯爲莘故，繩息嬀以語楚子。【註】譽也。【疏】字書繩作譝，从言，訓爲譽。

譝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
譝字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Sienna
shéng
Praise.
Sienna
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shéng］
["Guangyun" Shiling cut, flat steamed, boat. ]
(1) Reputation.
(2) Through the "rope". See "Sienna".
Sienna
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　譝; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 1182 to 13
[Guang Yun] Shi Ling Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Shen Ling Cut,? Sound rope. [Guang Yun] Yu Ye, also known as Ju Ye.　 Then I said Park Ye. [Zihuazi·Question about Shishi] Ziya is like a general child.　Another name. Xi Jia, see [Song History·Clan List].　[Jiyun] It is a rope. [Zuo Zhuan·Fourteenth Year of Zhuang] Cai Ai Hou is a cause of death, and Sheng Xi Zhu is in the language of Chu Zi. [Note] Yu also. 【Sparse】The words and books are made of ropes, and the words are used for fame.
